room_title: Escape room "The Alchemist's Chamber" by Somewhere Secret in Fort Collins
review: We loved this Escape Room. It seemed more authentic than most with very diverse, ingenious clues, and unexpected turns that kept the game alive and moving. We did the room with 6 people the youngest was 12, and we all stayed busy, and were useful uncovering all the hidden clues. We all loved it! Must check it out!

room_title: Escape room "The Alchemist's Chamber" by Somewhere Secret in Fort Collins
review: The people who designed this game are whimsical geniuses, it's totally different from other escape rooms and is definitely worth the visit. Plus there's an awesome prize if you find it!

room_title: Escape room "The Alchemist's Chamber" by Somewhere Secret in Fort Collins
review: This was so fun! We decided last minute to do this escape room for our company holiday party and everyone had a blast!
